text:
Martha and I send our deepest sympathy and condolences to Linda and the entire Hays family. Mayor Hays and I were friends of long-standing and worked together on many civic projects.  
 
In 2014, Pat and I engaged in a vigorous campaign against each other for Arkansas‚Äôs Second District seat in the U.S. House of Representatives. He will always have my respect for his two decades of devoted public service for the citizens of North Little Rock.

Rest in peace, my friend.

I am deeply disappointed by the decision today to remove @SpeakerMcCarthy from Speaker of the House.¬†

Over the past nine months as Speaker, he has delivered win after win, including some of the most conservative spending cuts and policies in history. I am proud of his accomplishments and am grateful to him for his service to this body and our nation.

My full statement, below:
hill.house.gov/news/document‚Ä¶

.@SpeakerMcCarthy has led our Commitment to America and has been scoring wins despite our Senate and White House under Democrat control. 

Under his strong leadership, House Republicans are cutting trillions in spending and bringing conservative policies back to the House. Thank you, Mr. Speaker.
This Congress needs to come together to go back and get our spending and border under control - both are of concern to the American people.

The Biden Admin‚Äôs attack on federal education funding for shooting sports programs would deprive our youth from learning important skills that would teach them how to safely handle firearms. 

I am a proud cosponsor of the Protecting Hunting Heritage and Education Act and am pleased to see it pass the House Floor tonight. 

My full statement, below:
hill.house.gov/news/document‚Ä¶
One heck of a battle for the #boot in Baton Rouge. Congratulations #Tigers and @SteveScaliseüò≠üèà
Every state in our country is a border state because of the Biden Administration's policies that have led to the immigration crisis. Our southwest border must be secured to keep our communities safe.

We want the most conservative policy out of the House because we know we have to get something through the Senate and to President Biden's desk that is conservative and responsible. 

I addressed government funding negotiations on @SquawkCNBC. Watch ‚¨áÔ∏è

Last week, I met with the Armenian Ambassador to the US, @LilitMakunts, about the ongoing situation in Nagorno-Karabakh. Over 100,000 innocent Armenians have been under siege since December 2022, receiving limited to no assistance. #Azerbaijan must cease its military operation and engage diplomatically with #Armenia to help bring an end to this conflict. I echo the calls of religious leaders here in the US for our government to take action and provide assistance to Armenia and Azerbaijan to end this conflict and come to a peaceful solution.

Happy 76th birthday, @usairforce! Thank you to our brave men and women who selflessly serve our nation every day, and to all those who served before them. I am honored to represent our service members at @LRAFB!

For 236 years, the Constitution has shaped our Republic and protected our individual rights and freedoms. Today, we celebrate our governing document and the bedrock principles that guide our great nation. #ConstitutionDay

Congrats to my Chief of Staff A. Brooke Bennett for being named one of the @thehill‚Äôs 25 staffers that make Capitol Hill run. I am grateful to have had you on my team for the past 9 years - we are all proud of you!

There is absolutely no support for a #CBDC in Congress, except from those who think somehow a CBDC might be an amazing solution to many unstated global problems.

@FinancialCmte

I am grateful to @RepJasonSmith and @WaysandMeansGOP for hosting a Member Day hearing today and allowing me the opportunity to speak about my bill, the SSDI Return to Work Act. This commonsense legislation, which I have previously introduced alongside @SenTomCotton, would ensure the #SSDI program remains viable for future generations of citizens that require disability assistance.

.@POTUS‚Äô reckless deal to send $6 billion in frozen assets to Iran, the leading state sponsor of terrorism and egregious human rights violator, only further emboldens bad actors and puts the safety of American citizens who hold a blue passport at risk around the world.

On this day 22 years ago, our nation and world changed forever. 

9/11 First Responders were honored this morning on the bank of the Arkansas River at Rockwater Village. Today, we remember the thousands of lives we lost and countless lives affected by the horrible attacks of September 11, 2001. We will #NeverForget.

It is past time for #Russia to take financial responsibility for its assault on another sovereign nation. My legislation, the Ukraine Reconstruction Act, will hold Russia liable for the cost instead of placing the burden on American taxpayers.

My full statement, below:
hill.house.gov/news/document‚Ä¶

Today, we celebrate the spirit of hard-working Americans who persevere in pursuit of the American dream. I am thankful for all central Arkansans who work tirelessly every day to support our economy and make a strong impact in our local communities. Happy #LaborDay!

Bill Richardson was a devoted public servant who fought tirelessly on behalf of Americans wrongfully detained abroad in the years following his government service. He exemplified what it means to be a voice for the voiceless. Martha and I are praying for his family and loved ones during this time.
First win of the season! Go #hogs #WPS üèàüèà

Two years ago, the Biden Administration's decision to withdraw from Afghanistan without an adequate plan was reckless. Our botched withdrawal resulted in the deaths of 13 soldiers and stranded many Americans and Afghan partners behind enemy lines. We will continue to press for answers in Congress and hold the Biden Admin accountable for what transpired.

Today on #InternationalOverdoseAwarenessDay, we remember those who were lost due to opioids like #Fentanyl and other drug overdoses and support family and friends left behind. I will continue to fight in Congress to address the opioid crisis in our country.

Americans have a right to financial privacy. We do not need a #CBDC that can track your purchases like China does with their Digital Yuan. The authority rests with Congress, not unelected bureaucrats, to create and implement a CBDC. And that‚Äôs non-partisan.

I am saddened to hear about @SteveScalise's diagnosis. Steve has always been a fighter. The entire @HouseGOP stands with him. Martha and I are praying for his full recovery - our thoughts and prayers are with the Scalise family.

I sent a letter alongside @PatrickMcHenry and @RepHuizenga to the @FederalReserve objecting to their efforts to undermine @FinancialCmte's progress on stablecoin legislation. The Fed has chosen to effectively prevent banks from issuing payment stablecoins.

#crypto #digitalassets

I had the pleasure of visiting @syrianetf's Wisdom House in northwest Syria and House of Healing in Gaziantep, Turkey on Sunday morning. I thank the amazing, dedicated staffs at both for their incredible work in helping the Syrian people. 

My statement:
hill.house.gov/news/document‚Ä¶

Two years ago, we tragically lost 13 American heroes. Their courage and sacrifice will never be forgotten.  @HouseGOP will continue to fight for answers and hold the Biden Administration accountable for their reckless actions.

Everyone agrees the #crypto ecosystem needs regulatory clarity. The @SECGov and @CFTC need defined statutory authorities over digital assets to adequately protect investors and consumers.  My bill, #FIT21, provides this clarity.

Happy Birthday to @NatlParkService! 

I am grateful for the natural treasures that exist within our country and Arkansas.

Today is Ukraine's Independence Day. 

I stand with the Ukrainian people who are fighting to defend their sovereign nation. We must work together to eject Putin's army and help #Ukraine remain independent.

I sat down with @Steven_Ehrlich from @ForbesCrypto to discuss all things #crypto.

Read more‚¨áÔ∏è
forbes.com/sites/digital-ass‚Ä¶

I am pleased that US-ROK-Japan leaders are meeting today. I met with both leaders this year & called for a trilateral summit during the 2022 Foley Trilateral Legislative Exchange. We must work trilaterally to ensure peace & prosperity in the Indo-Pacific.

mansfieldfdn.org/blog/joint-‚Ä¶

The US must lead in combating #captagon trade & work with our allies in Europe & the Middle East to curb its proliferation. My bill, the Illicit Captagon Trafficking Suppression Act, would further press #Assad by issuing new sanctions against perpetrators who traffic this drug.

Visiting with Little Rock-based FinTech @BondDotAi at the @VentureCenter‚Äôs 2023 FinTech Summit.

Thanks to @ABABankers, @USOCC, and @simmons_bank for our great panel discussion on the future of #DigitalAssets and #fintech.

Two years ago, Kabul fell to the Taliban as we withdrew due to reckless decisions made by the Biden Admin. We tragically lost 13 brave soldiers and left thousands of US citizens & Afghan partners behind. We must continue to fight for answers & ensure this never happens again.

This week is #StartupAdvocacyWeek. I'm thankful for our entrepreneurs in central Arkansas who are critical in driving economic growth throughout our local communities.

@RepScholten and I are co-chairs of #CongressionalStartupDay and look forward to celebrating on 8/16!
Mimi Abochale, Student Body President at Central High, spoke at today‚Äôs groundbreaking about their exciting new $60 million science building and athletic field house!

@FinancialCmte is countering @GaryGensler and @SECGov on their unreasonable mandates that negatively affect businesses and the #crypto ecosystem. America should be the leader in web 3 development and digital asset innovation.

WATCH‚¨áÔ∏è | @MorningsMaria

As long as ransom payments continue to be the US foreign policy response, #Iran will continue to take Americans and hold them hostage. We must severely punish those countries that take Americans solely for their blue passport, rather than reward them with a windfall of billions.
.@SecYellen said she disagreed with #Fitch downgrading the U.S. credit rating due to "outdated data." The updated data are in and they are alarming.
Amazing night on the campus of @ucabears cheering on the student athletes!  Great to be with @UCApresdavis Coach Brown and Trustee Terry Fiddler. Go #Bears
On National #PurpleHeartDay, we honor the brave men and women who have selflessly served and sacrificed for our country. Their courage inspires us all.

We need to fight for smart priorities that lead to balanced budgets including bipartisan long-term reforms to mandatory spending accounts. Only with long-term planning and priorities can we earn the top AAA rating back and ensure our fiscal future for our kids and grandkids.

#Bidenflation also crushes the federal budget with 10% of federal spending going to interest on the national debt. Interest in 2024 will be second only to the $800 billion annual defense budget. Biden's budget deficits have led to our debt being larger than our entire economy!

#Fitch's Treasury bond downgrade should be a wake-up call to the American people, Congress & the Biden Admin. #Bidenomics is driving up costs for families with regulatory mandates and record levels of out-of-control spending. This 40-year high inflation hurts all Americans.

Happy 233rd Birthday to the U.S. Coast Guard!

Thank you to those in central Arkansas and across the nation for serving in the @USCG to protect our maritime borders and conduct life-saving rescue missions.

So pleased to join in @SarahHuckabee‚Äôs announcement that Larry Walther will serve AR as State Treasurer. He is a superb leader. In the face of the sudden death of Treasurer Mark Lowery, Larry will provide both stability and innovation to this critical fiduciary responsibility.

Thank you to @USRepMikeFlood for hosting the Flyover Fintech Conference today! I was pleased to join @WarrenDavidson, @USRepMikeFlood and other industry leaders to discuss the future of #fintech and #digitalassets.

Years of poor financial management at Yellow has resulted in hard-working people losing their jobs. 

To prevent similar situations in the future, the COC provided recommendations in their final report investigating @USTreasury's $700M loan to Yellow: coc.senate.gov/report/the-ye‚Ä¶

My vote today was for the men and women of central Arkansas and across the country because they have selflessly served and sacrificed for our nation. 

My statement on the passage of the FY24 Military Construction and VA Appropriations Bill:
hill.house.gov/news/document‚Ä¶

I am proud that my landmark bill, the FIT for the 21st Century Act, passed out of @FinancialCmte today with bipartisan support and look forward to this bill also passing out of @HouseAgGOP and advancing to the House Floor. #FIT21  

My full statement: 
hill.house.gov/news/document‚Ä¶
Martha and I are so sad to learn the news of the death of former state legislator and Arkansas State Treasurer Mark Lowery. Our prayers for comfort are extended to his family and many friends.

The FIT for the 21st Century Act, coauthored by myself and members on @HouseAgGOP, will provide clarity on the @SECGov and @CFTC's jurisdiction over digital assets, fill the gaps in the existing system and provide robust consumer protections.

More ‚¨áÔ∏è
#FIT21 @FinancialCmte

I, alongside @CongressmanGT and @RepDustyJohnson, today introduced landmark legislation to establish a functional regulatory framework for #DigitalAssets that will protect consumers and keep innovation in the United States. Read more:

@FinancialCmte @HouseAgGOP

Congratulations to my Chief of Staff, A. Brooke Bennett, for being named one of two 2023 Women's Congressional Staff Foundation Leadership Impact Awardees!

Israel is not a racist state.

Congress brought a Resolution to the House Floor that absolutely shows our determination to support our friendship and partnership with Israel that stretches nearly 80 years.

I introduced the Illicit Captagon Trafficking Suppression Act which will further press the #Assad regime by imposing new sanctions to directly target individuals and networks associated with the production and trafficking of #captagon.

The war in #Ukraine is our Lusitania moment. The weaknesses in our defense industrial base and reliance on foreign nations in key industrial and economic areas must be addressed by Congress.
Happy #FourthofJuly to all!

In their report to Congress, I was pleased to see the Biden Administration clearly outline their strategy to disrupt and dismantle the #Assad regime's production and trafficking of the lethal narcotic #Captagon in Syria. 

al-monitor.com/originals/202‚Ä¶

In his time as Pres. of @WorldBank, @DavidRMalpass was instrumental in leading the bank‚Äôs response to the pandemic, war in Ukraine, and policies to further economic growth & reduce poverty around the globe. I thank him for his years of service & wish him & Adele the very best.
Today, @SCOTUS validated my strong belief that @POTUS exceeded his executive authority in his unfair and ill-conceived plan to "forgive" student loan debt.

Another reckless decision by @POTUS. Instead of the US giving the #1 state sponsor of terrorism billions of dollars, #Iran should be releasing all Americans wrongfully held in their country, ceasing support for terrorism, and stopping violence against peaceful protesters.
I am saddened to hear of Ryan Mallett's passing. A former Razorback, Ryan was a talented football player who had a full life ahead. Martha and I are praying for his family and loved ones.

The special report released today by the Congressional Oversight Commission verifies that Yellow Corporation should have never received a $700 million taxpayer bailout from @USTreasury.

It was an honor to celebrate Frederick Law Olmsted's legacy, the designer of the US Capitol Grounds. Thank you @RepDebDingell, @OlmstedNetwork, @uscapitol, @NationalASLA, and all others who joined this morning's tree dedication ceremony!

Prime Minister @narendramodi is a key ally of the US and a leader in strengthening the relationship between India and the US. I welcome him to the US during his historic visit this week and look forward to his joint address to Congress. @IndianEmbassyUS
Being a father has been one of the greatest joys of my life. Happy #FathersDay to all dads out there!

I‚Äôm proud to represent generations of Arkansas families like mine and those who choose to call #Arkansas home. Especially today, I encourage my fellow Arkansans to take advantage of all the Natural State offers. Happy 187th birthday, Arkansas!

I was delighted to host Sophia Coffey for #FosterYouthShadowDay! She is passionate about ensuring college students, who are former foster youth, have access to housing and mentoring services. 

Sophia is #BeyondResilient and has a bright future ahead.

For 246 years, the Stars & Stripes have represented our great nation. Today, on #FlagDay, there is a flag flying over the U.S. Capitol that honors Air Force Veteran John Penrod from AR-02. I am proud to celebrate a great Arkansan and the symbol of our nation ‚Äì the American flag!
For 248 years, the Army and the men and women who filled its ranks have exemplified courage, honor, and patriotism. I‚Äôm proud to honor America's best, today and every day. Happy birthday, @USArmy!

During today's @FinancialCmte hearing, I spoke with @SecYellen about the need for legislation to take title of Russian sovereign assets to pay for the reconstruction of Ukraine - which my draft bill, the Ukraine Reconstruction Act, would do.

While @RepHaleyStevens and I continue our work to bring wrongfully detained Americans home through our Hostage Task Force, I will continue to support resolutions like H.Res. 272 & 377 - which we are voting on today. We must show Paul Whelan and Evan Gershkovich our support.

Congratulations to Cori Keller for being crowned the new Miss Arkansas 2023! I look forward to watching her proudly represent Arkansas and thank Ebony Mitchell for her leadership in representing our state for the past year as Miss Arkansas 2022.

I met with Bp. Wilfred Angabe and Fr. Remigius Ihyula of the Nigerian Clergy regarding the recent attacks against Christians in Nigeria. It is time for Congress to pass H.Res.82 and for @StateDept to designate Nigeria as a country of concern for violations of religious freedom.

79 years ago today, the beaches of Normandy were stormed by brave Allied troops. I visited the Normandy American Cemetery in 2017 to honor those who gave it all to fight for freedom that day. We will always remember their heroism and sacrifice on #DDay.

Today, I voted to cut over $2 trillion in federal spending ‚Äì the largest cut in United States history. @HouseGOP   voted to rein in President Biden‚Äôs spending addiction.

Great to see our homegrown success story @Walmart virtually ringing the @NYSE opening bell from Bentonville today!

This weekend, I visited the Arkansas State Veterans Cemetery to honor those who gave it all to serve and protect our nation. On #MemorialDay, I hope each of you will take a moment to reflect on those who paid the ultimate sacrifice defending our freedoms in America.

I, alongside Rep. Chris Smith, sent a letter to @POTUS urging the U.S. Pres. Delegation to Nigeria strongly reiterate the United States' commitment to int'l religious freedom and address the ongoing violence against Christians in Nigeria.

Over the past decade, opioids, like #fentanyl, have devastated our nation and led to skyrocketing overdoses and deaths. This week, I was proud to support multiple bills that combat the fentanyl crisis.

During Global Week of Prayer for China, my prayers are with those suffering under the Chinese Communist Party's regime. I encourage all to join me in praying for religious freedom, individual rights, an end to genocide of the Uyghurs, and a safe future for the people of China.

What we need President Biden to do is get serious. Let's have less finger-pointing, less name-calling,
and let's work together on a sensible and responsible way to raise the debt ceiling.

foxnews.com/video/6327984484‚Ä¶

I am saddened to hear of former U.S. Rep. Marion Berry‚Äôs passing. During Berry‚Äôs seven terms in Congress, he was a strong advocate for agriculture and other key issues that impacted his district. Martha and I are praying for his family and loved ones during this time.
Today we celebrate #NationalArmedForcesDay, where we celebrate the courageous men and women who currently serve our country. Thank you to all of our servicemembers for protecting our freedom!

Today, I released draft legislation that would force #Russia to pay for its war damages in #Ukraine. Putin's government must bear the responsibility of paying for its illicit war.

Wonderful to see Tom Loyd and Gus Papathanasiou from @CapitolPolice at the 42nd Annual National Peace Officers' Memorial Service yesterday. Thank you to all our brave law enforcement officers for your selfless service!

During #NationalPoliceWeek, I am proud to honor the brave men and women who took an oath to serve and protect our local communities. Thank you to all our law enforcement officers for their selfless service!
Happy Mother‚Äôs Day to all the wonderful mothers out there! Thank you for your endless love and care to our children.

Since President Biden took office, the situation at our southwest border has deteriorated. The reckless inaction by the Biden Administration has created the current humanitarian and security crisis at our southwest border.

Assad‚Äôs #Captagon drug is devastating families in the region, fueling his terror partnership with Hezbollah and Iran with billions in illegal funding.  Recognition by the Arab League should not deter the U.S. government's obligation to sanction Assad. @syrianetf @sa_council

Last weekend, the Arab League readmitted Syria, led by #Assad, a documented war criminal and now transnational drug kingpin. In recent meetings with Jordan‚Äôs King Abdullah and Egypt‚Äôs President El-Sisi, I made the case that this decision was a mistake. @HouseForeignGOP

Today is #NationalFentanylAwarenessDay. Opioids such as #fentanyl have led to a significant increase in overdose deaths in the United States - many users consume it unknowingly.

fentanylawarenessday.org/

This week, we celebrate the 40th anniversary of National Travel and Tourism Week - where we recognize the unique businesses and attractions that make Arkansas' 2nd District a great place to both work and explore. #nttw23 #TravelForward

As a devout Catholic, my faith has always served as a guiding beacon in my life. I encourage all to join me in praying for our neighbors, our nation, and the world today as we bow our heads in honor of #NationalDayofPrayer.
May is Military Appreciation Month! I am grateful for our brave men and women who sacrifice everything to serve our nation and protect our freedom in America.
Today is #TeacherAppreciationDay! I am thankful for all our hard-working educators in central Arkansas and across our nation.

The Limit, Save, Grow Act makes NO cuts to veterans‚Äô benefits ‚Äì this is a false claim being pushed by Democrats.

I urge President Biden to come to the table and negotiate with @SpeakerMcCarthy on a responsible approach to the debt ceiling rather than pushing false narratives.

I am proud to support small businesses in central Arkansas and across our nation. Small businesses are the backbone of America and the lifeblood of our local communities. During #NationalSmallBusinessWeek, I encourage you to visit your favorite small business.

I was honored to be a part of the Escort Committee to welcome President Yoon to the House Floor. From the ashes of the Korean Conflict to one of the world's largest economies, South Korea is a testament to America's dedication to support democracy.

The Chinese Communist Party must release Mark Swidan. Today, I was proud to join my Republican colleagues in support of the passage of H. Res. 90, where we demanded Mark Swidan's release on the House Floor. It is critical that we get every wrongfully detained American home.

We must rein in reckless spending and work towards going back to a balanced budget.

Arkansas is home to seven unique national parks that each enjoy a different piece of history. All national park fees are waived from April 22 - 30th.

I encourage everyone to get out and explore the Natural State!

This leak begs the question we have already dealt with this year, which is the handling of classified information - we need to know how it is stored and what is the training.

Thank you to all of our high school seniors who have enlisted in our military post graduation. It is encouraging to see our youth stepping up and answering the call to serve! @OCSalutes
He is risen! Happy #Easter to all who celebrate! May your day be filled with hope and joy.
Today, on #GoldStarSpousesDay, we honor the spouses of those who made the ultimate sacrifice for our nation. Their strength and bravery will never be forgotten.

With severe storms expected again this evening across central Arkansas, it is critical that you and your family are prepared in case of emergency. There is a possibility of high winds, hail, and tornadoes. Please stay up to date from local officials and stay in a safe location.

First Baptist Church in Jacksonville is offering shelter,  food, and clothing for those who need:

401 N 1st Street, Jacksonville, AR

Today, the IRS announced that those affected by the severe storms in Arkansas now have until July 31, 2023 to make tax payments and file federal business and individual tax returns.

To learn more, please visit: 
irs.gov/newsroom/irs-arkansa‚Ä¶

To reach @fema, please call 1-800-621-3362, visit disasterassistance.gov, or download the FEMA app from the App Store. FEMA is able to assist those who do not have insurance on their primary residence or are under-insured on their primary residence.
Additionally, my district office in Little Rock can assist with information. Please call my district office at 501-324-5941. My staff and I stand ready to help those affected by the severe storms.

The Arkansas Governor's website has an Arkansas Storm Recovery Information section which includes regularly updated information on federal resources, shelters, donations, and other key services. 

To learn more, please visit: governor.arkansas.gov/help-a‚Ä¶

Today, City Center is open again from 10am - 7pm CT and has food, clothing, and additional goods for all who need. For further information, please see below:

501-396-3355
315 N Shackleford Road, Little Rock
I thank President Biden for the quick approval of Governor @SarahHuckabee‚Äôs request for support. @POTUS‚Äôs approval is critical in helping recovery efforts in #Arkansas.
